rows.label: tev900192_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, you showed up just at the right time.
I've got something to ask you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0020
rows.name:
Do you know about the Coalition
forces that preceded BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0030
rows.name:
I hear each nation contributed their own
hand-picked soldiers to form their ranks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0040
rows.name: You were in the military as well, I take it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: tev900192_SEL0060
rows.name: Say that you were.

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0070
rows.name:
I thought as much. There's just
something about your bearing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0080
rows.name:
I used to be in the German air force,
myself. Not that there are any countries
to distinguish between now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_JNK0090
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: tev900192_SEL0100
rows.name: Say you were a civilian.

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0110
rows.name:
A civilian, picked for combat assignment?
You must've been something else...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_JNK0120
rows.name: Demur

rows.label: tev900192_SEL0130
rows.name:
Say you don't know,
on account of your memory loss.

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0140
rows.name: Memory loss... Right, I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0150
rows.name:
Well, considering your sterling record
at BLADE, I think it's safe to say in all
likelihood you saw some active duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0160
rows.name:
Anyway, back on Earth I got scouted for
the Coalition forces' Skell detachment,
and transferred out of the Luftwaffe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0170
rows.name:
But then the government called for urgent
Skell development, ran out of test pilots,
and so I fell into my new line of work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0180
rows.name:
I got sent to Grenada in a hurry, where
the first Skell I got to test was one that
Alicia had designed...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0190
rows.name:
That was our humble beginning,
and the rest is history.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_JNK0200
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev900192_SEL0210
rows.name:
Ask about her and Alicia's
early days together.

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0220
rows.name:
I've heard that before coming to Grenada,
Leesh was working in weapon dev for the
Indian government.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0230
rows.name:
But once Project Exodus went public,
she decided she wanted to work for all
of humanity. Big step up, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0240
rows.name:
That was about the time I joined Grenada
as well. The actual meeting was pretty
much just chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0250
rows.name:
Ever since then, Leesh and I have been
joined at the hip. And sure, it's been a
bumpy road, but I've enjoyed every mile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0260
rows.name:
And it looks like we can keep going.
Alicia matters so much to me.
And, just so you know...you do too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_JNK0270
rows.name: Pry

rows.label: tev900192_SEL0280
rows.name:
Ask if she'd consider returning
to the military.

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0290
rows.name:
You know, some of my old war buddies
ask me the same thing sometimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0300
rows.name:
But really, I think being a test pilot
might just be my calling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0310
rows.name:
Learning to master new Skell models is
like pilot catnip. It's always pushing me
to be stronger...faster...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0320
rows.name:
Not to mention, all my testing affects
other pilotsâ€”maybe even saves lives.
I can't turn my back on that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900192_MSG0330
rows.name:
I fight the way I know best.
...That's all there is to it.[ST:wait ]
